uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.analytic.operation.handler.cache

Class AnalyticCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.analytic.operation.handler.cache.AnalyticCache

  • public class AnalyticCache
extends Object
    Wrapper around the CacheServiceLoader to provide an interface for handling the AnalyticDetails for a Gaffer graph.

    • Method Detail

      • addAnalyticOperation

        public void addAnalyticOperation(AnalyticDetail analyticOperation,
                                 boolean overwrite,
                                 uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.user.User user)
                          throws uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException
        If the user is just adding to the cache, ie the overwrite flag is set to false, then no security is added. However if the user is overwriting the Analytic operation stored in the cache, then their opAuths must be checked against the write roles associated with the AnalyticDetail. If it turns out the user is overwriting a non-existent AnalyticOperationDetail, then the users AnalyticOperationDetail will be added normally.
        Parameters:
        analyticOperation - The AnalyticOperationDetail that the user wants to store.
        overwrite - Flag relating to whether the user is adding (false) or updating/overwriting (true).
        user - The user making the request.
        Throws:
        uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException - thrown if the user doesn't have write access to the AnalyticOperationDetail requested, or if the add operation fails for some reason.

      • addAnalyticOperation

        public void addAnalyticOperation(AnalyticDetail analyticOperation,
                                 boolean overwrite,
                                 uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.user.User user,
                                 String adminAuth)
                          throws uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException
        If the user is just adding to the cache, ie the overwrite flag is set to false, then no security is added. However if the user is overwriting the Analytic operation stored in the cache, then their opAuths must be checked against the write roles associated with the AnalyticDetail. If it turns out the user is overwriting a non-existent AnalyticOperationDetail, then the users AnalyticOperationDetail will be added normally.
        Parameters:
        analyticOperation - The AnalyticOperationDetail that the user wants to store.
        overwrite - Flag relating to whether the user is adding (false) or updating/overwriting (true).
        user - The user making the request.
        adminAuth - The admin auth supplied for permissions.
        Throws:
        uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException - thrown if the user doesn't have write access to the AnalyticOperationDetail requested, or if the add operation fails for some reason.

      • deleteAnalyticOperation

        public void deleteAnalyticOperation(String name,
                                    uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.user.User user)
                             throws uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException
        Checks whether a User has write access to the cache. If they do then the AnalyticOperationDetail and name is removed from the cache. If they don't or the AnalyticOperationDetail doesn't exist then an Exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the AnalyticOperationDetail a user would like to delete.
        user - A User object that can optionally be used for checking permissions.
        Throws:
        uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException - Thrown when the AnalyticOperationDetail doesn't exist or the User doesn't have write permission on the AnalyticOperationDetail.

      • deleteAnalyticOperation

        public void deleteAnalyticOperation(String name,
                                    uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.user.User user,
                                    String adminAuth)
                             throws uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException
        Checks whether a User has write access to the cache. If they do then the AnalyticOperationDetail and name is removed from the cache. If they don't or the AnalyticOperationDetail doesn't exist then an Exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the AnalyticOperationDetail a user would like to delete.
        user - A User object that can optionally be used for checking permissions.
        adminAuth - The admin auth supplied for permissions.
        Throws:
        uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException - Thrown when the AnalyticOperationDetail doesn't exist or the User doesn't have write permission on the AnalyticOperationDetail.

      • getAnalyticOperation

        public AnalyticDetail getAnalyticOperation(String name,
                                           uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.user.User user)
                                    throws uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException
        First gets the AnalyticOperationDetail in question and checks whether the user has read access before returning the value. If the AnalyticOperationDetail doesn't exist or the User doesn't have permission to read this AnalyticOperationDetail, then an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the AnalyticOperationDetail held in the cache.
        user - The User object that is used for checking read permissions.
        Returns:
        AnalyticOperationDetail.
        Throws:
        uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException - thrown if the AnalyticOperationDetail doesn't exist or the User doesn't have permission to read it.

      • getAnalyticOperation

        public AnalyticDetail getAnalyticOperation(String name,
                                           uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.user.User user,
                                           String adminAuth)
                                    throws uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException
        First gets the AnalyticOperationDetail in question and checks whether the user has read access before returning the value. If the AnalyticOperationDetail doesn't exist or the User doesn't have permission to read this AnalyticOperationDetail, then an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the AnalyticOperationDetail held in the cache.
        user - The User object that is used for checking read permissions.
        adminAuth - The admin auth supplied for permissions.
        Returns:
        AnalyticOperationDetail.
        Throws:
        uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException - thrown if the AnalyticOperationDetail doesn't exist or the User doesn't have permission to read it.

      • getAllAnalyticOperations

        public uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.commonutil.iterable.CloseableIterable<AnalyticDetail> getAllAnalyticOperations(uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.user.User user)
        Get all the Analytic operations held in the cache.
        Parameters:
        user - The User object that is used for checking read permissions.
        Returns:
        a CloseableIterable containing the Analytic operation details

      • clear

        public void clear()
           throws uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException
        Clear the Analytic operation cache.
        Throws:
        uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException - if there was an error clearing the cache

      • deleteFromCache

        public void deleteFromCache(String name)
                     throws uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException
        Delete the specified AnalyticDetail from the cache.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the operation to delete
        Throws:
        uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException - if there was an error deleting the operation from the cache

      • addToCache

        public void addToCache(String name,
                       AnalyticDetail operation,
                       boolean overwrite)
                throws uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException
        Add the specified Analytic operation to the cache.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the operation to add
        operation - the details of the new Analytic operation
        overwrite - if true, overwrite any existing entry which matches the provided name
        Throws:
        uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException - if there was an error adding the operation to the cache

      • getFromCache

        public AnalyticDetail getFromCache(String name)
                            throws uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException
        Retrieve the specified Analytic operation from the cache.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Analytic operation to retrieve
        Returns:
        the details of the requested Analytic operation
        Throws:
        uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.named.operation.cache.exception.CacheOperationFailedException - if there was an error accessing the cache
